CustomField.formula: IF( Document_Check_Sesuai__c == TRUE || CONTAINS(Loan__r.Loan_Status__c, "Cancel") || CONTAINS(Loan__r.Loan_Status__c, "Golive"), "", HYPERLINK("/lightning/action/quick/Document_BFI__c.Upload_Document?objectApiName&context=RECORD_DETAIL&recordId=" & CASESAFEID(Id) & "&backgroundContext=%2Flightning%2Fr%2FApplication__c%2F" & "%2Fview&retUrl=", "Upload File", "_self"))
CustomField.label: Upload Link
